official_title: To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to establish a measure for determining deposit insurance coverage that is fair to depositors and taxpayers, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Deposit Insurance Reform Act of 1992 - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to direct the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) to aggregate according to a prescribed formula the amounts of all deposits in an insured depository institution which are maintained by a depositor in order to determine the net amount of insurance due such depositor.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to establish a measure for determining deposit insurance coverage that is fair to depositors and taxpayers, and for other purposes.
